member.name: T:Actemium.Tracing.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Actemium.Tracing.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Actemium.Tracing.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Actemium.Tracing.TraceUtils.Sinks
member.summary: The sink collection containing all objects implementing ITraceSink. A sink is an addon on the promatic tracing. At this moment a Seq sink exists, letting you easily send promatic tracing log statements to seq.

member.name: P:Actemium.Tracing.TraceUtils.LogSeperateErrorsSuffix
member.summary: Specify a filename suffix if you want to make an extra logfile with the ERRORs

member.name: P:Actemium.Tracing.TraceUtils.LogSeperateWarningsSuffix
member.summary: Specify a filename suffix if you want to make an extra logfile with the WARNINGs (and ERRORs)

member.name: P:Actemium.Tracing.TraceUtils.CleanupDelay
member.summary: Number of days to keep the logfiles

member.name: P:Actemium.Tracing.TraceUtils.TraceFilePath
member.summary: The path for the trace logfiles. If not specified then the application directory is used.

member.name: P:Actemium.Tracing.TraceUtils.KeepFileOpenTime
member.summary: The logfile is auto-closed after this interval (msec) when idle

member.name: M:Actemium.Tracing.TraceUtils.#cctor
member.summary: Default shared constructor. Try to get CleanupDelay, TraceFilePath and TraceFilePrefix settings from the config file of the calling application.
